name: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
summary: The film finds the duo in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.
info:
• 中文名: 猫和老鼠：西部大冒险
  • 话数: 1
  • 发售日: 2022年1月25日
  • 片长: 75分钟
  • 原作: William Hanna / Joseph Barbera
  • 原案: Will Finn
  • 导演: Darrell Van Citters
  • 编剧: William Waldner (teleplay)
  • 音乐: Vivek Maddala
  • 制片人: Ashley Postlewaite / Kimberly S. Moreau / Darrell Van Citters / Sam Register
  • 剪辑: Michael D'Ambrosio
  • 动画制作: Renegade Animation / Warner Bros. Animation
  • 製作: Warner Bros. Entertainment
